title: 3 Bedroom, 2 Bathroom, unit very near DT LA
posting_body: Large Three bedroom unit apartment, with extra rooms for office, den, etc. and newly restored Hardwood floors.
rent amount $2900, Plus $200 for all the utilities,  Unit has big size bedrooms with big closets.
extra storage areas, Linen closet  Big living room.
Refrigerator and stove available for extra $10 each, Newly painted, remodeled  kitchen with new simulated black Granite counter top, Nice cabinets,  beautiful Hardwood Floors.
we also have coin washers and dryers available 24 hours at a low price,  unit is Available soon.
Upstairs  unit with entrance in the front and entrance in the back.
also has plenty of street parking, text or Call to get latest information.
Most tenants have been there over 15 years.

Near the New, 6th street bridge that was recently built.
